name: Knights Line of Defense
description:
Knights Line of Defense is a third-person tower defense game where the Player has multiple allies to choose from to help him protect their kingdom and reach their goal.

The objective of the game is to stop our enemies from reaching the final line of defense (heroes fortress), while attacking those enemies and using resources (random coins that appear on screen) that allows us to bring more allies. If there’s no more enemies, the goal is to reach the enemies spawning point (their lair). 

The game levels occur in different mazes across the levels. Each area contains a specific number and type of enemies. The main goal is to stop those enemies from reaching a certain point of the area. The player has to spawn his available characters in order to stop the enemies from reaching their goal and also reach their lair. 

Game Mechanics:

All the characters are moved by simple AI scripts.

The player summons his characters by exchanging coins.

When one character is selected it becomes unselectable for a specific time.

When summoned, the heroes (Player's characters) follow a path. If they encounter enemies, a fight starts. If there's no more enemies, the heroes keep their course until they reach the end of the path, winning the game.

If the enemies get to the heroes fortress, the player loses the game.

More information about this game in the anexed GDD.
